summary: THE LOWER BALL JOINT ON THE TRUCK HAS FAILED THREE TIMES. FORTUNATLY IT HAS HAPPENED IN TOWN AT LOW SPEEDS. I AM TAKING THIS TRUCK OUT OF SERVICE BECAUSE THE NEXT TIME I MIGHT NOT BE SO LUCKEY AND KILL SOMEONE.  TO ME, A PART LIKE THAT SHOULD NEVER FAIL AS IT CAN CAUSE LOSS OF CONTROL AT ANY SPEED.
